content: repeat from * to end 5 sts round 9 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull to close p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired optional make pom and attach step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang abbreviations co cast on round s round s k knit rs right side k2tog knit 2 stitches together st s stitch es meas measures ws wrong side p purl * repeat the directions between the pm place marker asterisks as many times as repeat repeat indicated p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2023 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 09012023 p 05
